text:
How to turn any (long) video into a viral Linkedin post.

A step-by-step guide with the right AI tools:

1. First AI: Use Opus Clip.

☑ Go to opus .pro
☑ Upload your long video (or YouTube link).
☑ Use "Clip Anything", 30-60 seconds clips.
☑ Make sure it's a 4:5 video ratio for Linkedin.
☑ Select your favorite "preset template" for subtitles.

2. Second AI: Use Perplexity.

☑ Go to perplexity. ai
☑ Ask for a summary of the video.
☑ Then ask for a contrarian view on it.
☑ Copy your findings once you enjoy them.

3. Third AI: Use EasyGen.

☑ Go to app. easygen. io
☑ Generate a post > Find the "Topic" section.
☑ Paste your Perplexity findings inside "Topic".
☑ Hit "generate" until it's perfect. Edit if needed.

4. Go to Linkedin. Upload the video. Add the caption.

5. Go viral. Thank me later.
